name: Matteo Funghi
text: Thompson Roofing and Construction replaced the old wood siding on my house with vinyl siding and did a fantastic job! They were very professionally in their work and completed everything in a timely manner. When they finished the job, they made sure I was pleased with their work and followed up with me on items I wasn’t happy with until I was pleased with the final result. I highly recommend them for any of your remodeling needs. My rep was Adam Lee, give him a call!

resp.text: Thank you sire for trusting us with your project and sharing your experience. Your home was such a transformation, we too, got excited about the finish of the project. We were so glad to hear that your home is now the envy of the neighborood and a project you are proud of. Have a wonderful summer and let us know if we can help or service you in any way in the future. We are in your neighborhood. - The Thompson team

name: Emily Banta
text: When our house was hit by lightning, we called Thompson Roofing and Adam was on it! He sent someone out immediately to put a tarp on it so we didn’t have to worry about leaks. I appreciated how much he checked in on us during the process.

resp.text: From the initial roofing damage emergency through the insurance claims process all the way to the final nail picked up and the picture of your new roof, we are here for you. So glad everyone is okay and we were able to service you and help you restore your home after the storm. We are local experienced and available and if you need anymore help, Adam and the whole Thompson Roofing and Construction teamwork’s for you! Just reach out. Thank you for the best roofing company review we could ask for.

name: Greg Nix
text: Needed a re-roof and Adam Lee was very helpful and patient with us through the whole process, especially when it came to picking the correct color.  Presented us options and discussed typical problem areas with us.  Very informative and professional.  The work was completed on time and clean-up was verified by Adam when it was all over.  Really appreciate the quality and responsiveness of the whole Thompson Roofing and Construction Team. Will definitely recommend them to others.

resp.text: Thank you for the glowing review. We appreciate homeowners, like you and your family, who place value in quality workmanship and professionalism. It was truly our honor to serve you on your home improvement project and please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly if the need should ever arise or if you would like and estimate on another project. Your review and referral means so much to the entire team here at Thompson Roofing and Construction.

name: misty lou
text: Thompson Roofing is absolutely wonderful! The work they did on our house is perfect. They were quick and efficient. They did a wonderful job cleaning up afterwards! We will be customers for life! Adam Lee is the best there is!! Call and ask for him! You will NOT be disappointed!!

resp.text: Absolutely wonderful? We will take it! From all of us here at Thompson Roofing & Construction, we extend our sincerest gratitude for the review and 5 star referral. We know those are earned and we are grateful for the opportunity to earn your business and your trust. Stay connected so we can be available if or when you need us again. <3

name: jay hill
text: Drew and Darren were very professional, on time and very knowledgeable about their products. I would like to say they were on top of their job. They stayed in contact with me last night when I first posted I needed help on the siding and repair work. They stayed in contact with me by calling and messaging until they arrived. These guys are definitely a keeper for a business and valuable.

resp.text: Thanks for recognizing our star staff. It is quite a compliment to have the respect of your peers who have been in the business for decades. We are local, experienced and available if you ever needs us. Thompson Roofing & Construction is just a phone call away.

name: Stephanie Lee
text: Adam Lee and his crew at Thompson's Roofing are diligent, thorough, honest, humble and a pleasure to work with. They showed up when they said they would, did the job they promised with integrity, and followed up to make sure we were satisfied. Should we need any other roofing needs, we will gladly work with Adam and Thompson's Roofing again.

resp.text: Thank you for this five star review we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with Thompson Roofing & Construction and Adam we like him, too. Did you know we also do windows doors siding gutters and we are a general contractor if you need us for pretty much anything we are local experienced and available for you.￼ 👍🏼 it’s wonderful customers and reviews like this that keep us motivated to continue with the tradition of excellence.

name: Hannah Parker
text: John came out to give us a estimate and we couldn't refuse. A few days later they came back out to do the job and done a excellent job! We are very pleased with the work Thompson Roofing and Construction done, highly recommend!

resp.text: Wer are so happy that John was able to go the extra mile and take care of your home improvement job! Thank you Hannah. If you ever need our services again or know someone who does, John and all of us at Thompson are just a phone call away!

name: Mary Winland
text: We had a great experience with Thompson Roofing and Adam, our salesman from start to finish. Highly recommend! Would use them again in a heartbeat.

resp.text: Adam has been with us for a while and is a real caring professional. We are elated to hear that you are happy with the service and work that Thompson Roofing and Construction did from start to finish. We will try and keep that up on every job. We are local and here to serve our community. Call if you need us and thank you for the glowing review! - Thomspon Roofing and Construction

name: Dylan Parker
text: John Blankenship came out and gave us an estimate on New Gutters at a price we couldn't refuse. Gutters were installed professionally. Will be back for future business

resp.text: Whoot Whoot! That's what we do: make things happen ;) So happy to hear that your experience with Thompson Roofing and Construction was within budget, timeline and exceeded your expectations. Sometimes the stars align and we could not be happier! Thank you for the review

name: Laura Milone
text: Kyle did a great job explaining everything that we needed! Excellent service and very professional! Would recommend this company to everyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with Thompson Roofing & Construction. It's valued customers like you that keep us motivated every day. If you should need us for any further projects or service, please do not hesitate to reach out because when it comes to your home and our service, we're on top of it.

name: jason meisel
text: A great experience from start to finish. Very professional and responsive. Kyle O’Toole is a professional in every sense of the word. Don’t go to anyone else.

resp.text: Mr. Meisel, not much could motivate us more this morning than to hear about your fantastic experience with your home improvement job. We hope we have earned the opportunity and trust to help you, your family and your neighbors with their needs, as well. Thank you again for your review and for the confidence in Thomson Roofing & Construction. Oh, and we like Kyle, too. ;)

name: Lyn Quillin
text: Top notch, excellent company to do business with.  Answers questions, explains in detail about all the products that are going on your roof.  Friendly and knowledgable people to deal with concerning our roof.  Best thing I liked is there is an awesome demonstration given about the products, the costs, what each product does that goes on your roof and there is no pressure to decide what you want to buy.  The demonstration was thorough, very well detailed and explained and there was no doubt in my mind or my husband's mind as to what needed to go on our roof!  Sales person was friendly, had answers to all our questions, was in no hurry to rush us or push us into anything we might or might not want.  The display he presented showed us all products and their function and we could "handle" the material that went on the roof.  I especially liked the interaction and questions I had and the answers I got.  Our rep for this company was Kyle O'Toole!  Excellent in his presentation of products, all details answered.  Great experience.  Also a big thanks to Keith Burkes who was the supervisor on the job.  The workers did a hard day's labor and the roof was done in one day!  I would highly recommend this company.  Best experience ever on a roof!  We have been in good hands with this company!

resp.text: It is our mission to educate, inform and service each client .... thank you for noticing and sending those 5 stars. If you ever have a question or need our services, we are local and available for you. Thanks again, it's great customers like you who help us stay motivated.

name: Jason Hopkins
text: I called Thompson Roofing and Construction for a leaky roof for my 2018 build home, not knowing that it was a fairly minor issue.  I was actually expecting it to be a big deal given the leak made it all the way into my upstairs bedroom and seeing the decline in quality on new construction homes over the past few years. Darren did a brief inspection and informed me it was a minor issue with the sealant on my inlet/outlet vents (among other minor issues).  I was ready to pay the charge for whatever needed to be done, but Jamie showed up, fixed my issues AND cleaned my gutters (I didn’t even request that) and they just requested that I think of them next time I had a roofing need! No expense to me! That shows me these guys are committed to building a solid customer base because of the confidence in their superior quality and customer service. Outstanding! I definitely will be calling them again (although I hope I don’t have to)!

resp.text: Glad to be able to make your day and help. W are committed to being good neighbors and supporting our community here in the neighborhoods we work and live in at Thompson Roofing and Construction. Thank you for the glowing review. if you need us we are near and local.

name: Carey Harris
text: Great craftsmanship. Money well spent. Shout out to Kyle for his assistance.

resp.text: From all of here at Thompson Roofing and Construction ( 256roofing) Thank you for your confidence of our pride in our workmanship and process. The details matter. We are very glad that you had such a wonderful experience with us and we are here to serve you locally again if you may ever need us.

name: Kyle Middleton
text: Great place to go to get your house fixed up they stand by the work.

resp.text: Kyle, from all of us here at Thompson Roofing and Construction, you made our day with this honest review. It was our honor to be invited not to just "fix your house" but help "protect your home" for many years. You can always contact us if you need support for your workmanship or materials.

name: mike sullivan
text: I had several projects done. New windows, Great; New deck with roof, Great. Repaired chimney Great. Everything was done at a high standard. All Sub contractors were professional, clean and respectful. By far (I’m 60 + so I have experience to compare this to) one of the best I have every dealt with. I would recommend this company to family or friends with confidence I was not going to be embarrassed later after they did the job. And on time at the quoted price.

name: James Holland
text: Thompson Roofing and our liaison Kyle O’toole walked us through every step of the process- from building materials to warranties, Kyle listened to our needs and never tried to upsell us. As for work quality, the work crew arrived early, worked hard, and completed an in-depth removal and roof replacement in <2 days. Thompson Roofing also helped us with last minute requests our home buyers had for flashing, with a less than week turnaround!

resp.text: Thanks, James! We loved working with you.

name: Deborah Powell
text: Awesome roofing family... make sure you know everything that is going to be done, put into writing, follow up to make sure things were done and done right, ask if there is anything that we felt needed to be corrected.  Well above what we expected but greatly appreciated.

name: Lee Holt
text: Excellent customer service, from start to finish! Danny and Keith were very helpful in their respective roles. The roofing crew was great and did a thorough job in cleaning up afterwards. Nothing negative to say and will definitely contact Thompson Roofing and Construction for all of my future home related construction needs. Good to know there is a company out there that values customer service. Thank you!

resp.text: You got us! We do value service and quality above the industry standards. Thank you for the confidence in having us truly show you who we are and trusting us to go to work for you on your home.

name: Mark lapinskes
text: The experience has been very professional and timely from day one. From the initial visit by Marcus, then the immediate visits from Jamie to temporarily seal up leak issues (twice, for separate developing issues, one in the pouring rain!), through the complete re-roof by Angel and his crew, it all went seamless and smooth. They fixed all the underlying roof structural damage, flashing, and siding issues. Thompson even sent out a cleaner for my driveway to clean up after themselves. I truly believe that no other company would have been able to live up to their service. I couldn't even get professional repair quotes from two other companies, and the problems were incorrectly diagnosed by another. Since it ended up a complete re-roof, it was their loss. If I could rate Thompson 6 stars I would!

name: Gail Skinner
text: Inspector was very knowledgeable and professional. Work done was high quality. I highly recommend Thompson Roofing. You can tell they really care about their customers.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and others. It truly is wonderful homeowners like you who have kept us and Thompson Roofing and Construction going strong for so many years. We are here to service you if and when you need us.

name: James Howard
text: I moved into my house five years ago; about two years ago I had a leak in my foyer.  I had a handyman come out and “fix” what we believed to be the issue.  This past September, it rained really hard with wind-blown rain, etc. and my foyer was leaking, again.  And my living room near the back of the house, too.  Frustrated, I called Thompson since they fixed a weird issue with my roof recently.  Long story/short, they charged me less than the “not-so handyman” did and fixed the front and back leaks, and replaced a few bad roof shingles with matching shingles.  It has since rained once again like the Biblical flood, and not a single leak.  Save yourself the heartache and wasted money, just hire Thompson.  They are effective and professional, what more can you ask for?

resp.text: We can only ask for more appreciative homeowners like you! Thank you for your trust in us and our custom solutions for your home. Call if you ever need us again.

name: Luis Garcia
text: I've worked with Adam Lee over 2 years on various issues with my roof.  If you're searching for a professional roofer in Madison, stop searching.  Call Thompson and ask for Adam.  He's established a relationship of trust with us -- we know he's going to steer us towards the most cost effective path. An honest and hard working professional working for a superb company.  Keep it up!

name: Patrick Long
text: Had a fantastic and stress free experience getting my roof replaced through Thompson Roofing. They were completely thorough and transparent through the entire process. I highly recommend them for any roofing needs!

resp.text: Our goal at Thompson Roofing and Construction is to compliment and not complicate the process for our customers. It is not just another house project to us, it's your home and we value that sacred honor of being able to service your needs. Thank you so much for the recommendation. We are local and available if you may need any service or have other projects.

name: Andrew Rickabaugh
text: Kyle is a very professional and knowledgeable representative of this company. They are the only roofing company I turn to and I can always trust that my customers and I will be taken care of with them in the job!

resp.text: Andrew, it means the world to us to partner with local contracting professionals like you and your team. Together we accomplish so much more. Thank you.

name: Steve Klein
text: Great job on repairs and paint on exterior window frames, fascia board, and porch support pillars.  These guys are reliable, reasonably priced, and very easy to deal with.  First class professionals!

resp.text: You’re a first class customer! 👍🏼Thank you for sharing your experience. If you ever need our services again or no someone who may need them … we are still pretty easy to deal with 🤪😍

name: Maryandra Wiser (CookieMonster)
text: Great company to take care of our roofing needs. Only negative was waiting several weeks for a call back after leaving the first message asking for someone to come out to give a quote.  Thought we had been forgotten.   Once repairs were set up, crews were on time when they said they would be there. Friendly. Polite. Did their work quickly and efficiently. We will definitely use them again in the future as needed!

name: Joe Steele
text: Fantastic experience.  Thompson Roofing was highly professional, courteous, and affordable.  They have my highest endorsement for roofing work in the Huntsville area.

resp.text: We won't soon forget this praise. We appreciate great clients like you who trust us and allow us to go to work for you. If you ever need our services again here at Thompson Roofing and Construction we will suit up and be ready.

name: Lamont Redrick
text: Thompson Roofing did an excellent job on my chimney flashing and recovering the pipes on the roof. We purchase this home a year ago and knew it would need some repairs. Thompson Roofing came highly recommend and they delivered. We also had to get some patch work done on out ceiling drywall. It was repaired and painted seamlessly. They shared photos of their work when completed and explained what they did which is a plus.  Highly recommended!

name: jim black
text: My 85 year old Mom asked me to find her a local company to install her a new roof on her house, I contacted Thompson Roofing because of the good reports I heard about, what a good choice these guys are the Best, my Mom didn't really need me, Branden and Keith were such straight up guys anyone would feel ok around them. The crew that did the roof install did a super job left everything just the way they found it and the roof looks Great.....Thank you Dustin you have a bunch of good people in your company, Thank you...Jim Black

name: greta. gibson
text: The process was so smooth from the first initial contact to the very end. Very friendly, professional, and honest. Excellent job we will be utilizing Thompson Roofing and Construction for any home improvements or repairs from now on!

name: Roger Ellson
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job, from the initial inspection to the completion of the job.  Had the roof replaced, and new soffit, fascia, and gutters.  Everything was done well, and it looks great. Kyle and Keith did a great job planning and coordinating the work.

resp.text: It truly makes our day to know you value quality home improvement work as much as we do. Thank you so much for having confidence in us enough to offer such glowing review! We are local and available if you should ever need our services again. - The whole family at Thompson Roofing and Construction

name: James Sartor
text: Dustin's group did a great job. They were thorough and very informative. I will certainly consider them when the time comes for a complete replacement.

name: Deb Robinson
text: Everyone professional; very responsive to my initial inquiry and got us on the schedule sooner than expected.  Their quote was reasonable and they stood by it.  The roofers did an outstanding, quality job and cleaned up afterwards!  Highly recommend Thompson Roofing!

name: Follin Clark
text: Our roof was damaged by a large tree limb falling on it.  I got quotes from 3 roofing companies but Thompson was the only one who actually went in my attic space (which admittedly is more like a crawl space) and looked at the damage.  They were very professional, and offered us 3 roofing options and actually came to our house and explained the differences and showed us samples of the materials they would use.  They cleaned up very well afterward.  So far I have found only 1 nail.  When another smaller limb damaged a few shingles only 6 days after the roof was put on, they came back and fixed it at no charge.  I call that service!  Thank you Thompson Roofing!

resp.text: We never leave our post until properly relieved and stand by our commitment to not only provide quality local experienced workmanship but also service our customers as we would want to be serviced. Thank you for sharing your experience with others. In a competitive business climate we operate in, your genuine feedback and approval is a key ingredient to the providing and sharing information for others that may be searching for a new contractor. On behalf of all of us here at Thompson Roofing and Construction, Thank you and know we are still "on duty" to service you if the need should arise. We are very proud to be your trusted roofing and home improvement contractor.

name: sandra richardson
text: From the start when Kyle did my assessment I knew Thompson Roofing was the best choice for me.  Everything that Kyle told me would happen from start to finish was on point.  Thompson Roofing did an exceptional job and after it was completed when I looked out my window there was no evidence that they were there, everything was cleaned up. I appreciated the follow up the next day by the on-site supervisor. Thank you Thompson Roofing for making my house look soooo good. LOL.

name: Nancy Supko
text: Thompson Roofing did an excellent job on our roof. They were amazingly fast and cleaned up extremely well. Also we were very impressed with Chief Gutter Company that installed the downspouts and gutters. Great guys...did an excellent job!  Highly recommend this company.

name: Ginger Robinson
text: You guys are awesome! Great job and so fast! I highly recommend your company to anyone looking for roofing and construction workers. I will definitely be using your company in the future for all my roofing and construction needs. Thank you guys again for a quick and quality repair job.

name: Rebecca Monk Sims
text: This was the first company that provided a detailed quote and explained everything that would happen during the roof project.  The entire process was explained and followed by the employees.  It was obvious that they were professionals and were proud of heir work.  And wanted my business!

name: Kyong Roberts
text: Called Thompson Roofing for a client of mine and they were very responsive and punctual. Was able to explain to me and my client exactly what was needed to fix her roof and showed us pictures before and after everything was completed.  We were informed during the whole process and there was never a point where we both did not know what they were doing or when they were coming. I would highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Peter DEROCHEMONT
text: Outstanding and very professional job.  Extremely satisfied with finished product.  #1 in my book if needed again.

name: StevenElisa Allen
text: They were great from start to finish.  They came out the day I called to patch the roof and stop the leak.  They followed up each step of the way, making sure I was satisfied.  They even called after I paid, to make sure everything was still good.  This is how every business should be.  Use them.  You won’t regret it.

name: Les Lewis
text: Thompson Roofing provided a quality service at a reasonable price. Adam, who came out and performed the initial assessment was pleasant and professional. He arrived on time and performed a complete and thorough assessment of my roofing issues. Estimate was reasonable and the work was done within a few days. I'm really pleased with my experience and will use them again if the need arises.

name: Danny Quigley
text: After calling multiple companies for a quote, Thompson roofing was the only company to show up the day they said they were coming or even show up at all. Scott Shaw came out and was very honest and upfront with what we needed repaired. Anytime I had a question for Scott he was always quick to respond and just a great guy. Thompson Roofing did repairs on 2 roofs for us and would definitely call them again in the future.

name: Casey Hand
text: We had a great experience overall using Thompson roof! The only negatives were some damage was done in the process of getting some rotting wood replaced, not by Thompson roof but by the people they recommended. Love the outcome and can't believe how different the house looks with a better roof!

name: Justin Colar
text: We have just purchased a new home and unfortunately we have had some leaks that needed to be addressed. Thompson Roofing and Construction was put on the call to address our issues. Jamie did an excellent job in fixing our roof and was thorough in his explanations in what caused the leaks. I would recommend their services for all of your roofing needs.

name: Mark Unger
text: Great company to work with.  Great customer service!  Kyle insured the work was done to our satisfaction. We have had them do our roof along with other other projects. All results exceeded expectations. Keep up the great work.

name: Chuck Burch
text: We're relatively new to the area and the idea of replacing a roof that was probably 5 times larger than anything we had dealt with before was to say the least daunting.  So after we disposed of the "fly-by-night" guys (is there some unwritten rule that they all have to wear blue tooth head sets?) I asked around, got bids from 3 contractors and decided on Thompson - professional, price competitive, responsive - all the things I was looking for.  Immediately upon signing, I was given the nam of our  Project Manager and he held our hand guiding us throughout the lead-up and then the actual installation day.  I have never seen a crew so large yet so professional in my life and was impressed to say the least. 07h30 they were at the door and by 16h30 we had a beautiful new roof, the site was carefully "policed" for stray nails and other detritus and they were gone.  The next day Keith (our PM) came back to make sure things were done as he expected followed by our original "salesman" (that term is so inadequate) Kyle coming out the following day to walk the roof and the grounds and write up a final "punch list".  And within 24 hours we had been visited once again this time by a small set of the original crew who knocked out the punch list items in under and hour and then were gone again.  We are extremely pleased and would gladly recommend Thompson's to anyone else looking to replace a roof - large or small.  CB

name: Sandra Lyons
text: Very pleased with installation of my GAF Timberline HDZ roof by Thompson Roofing. They started as scheduled and were very professional. They cleaned up completely after the installation. Received GAF warranty afterwards as promised. I would certainly recommend to friends and family.

resp.text: It truly warms our hearts to look back at your wonderful review of our service to your family and your home. Thank you for sharing your experience with those that may be looking for a local, experienced roofing contractor and may consider our team here at Thompson Roofing and Construction. We hope this finds you and yours in the best of health and spirits and know we are here to service and stand by our workmanship if the need may ever arise. From all of us here, again, Thank You.

name: Miranda Murphy
text: I highly recommend Thompson roofing. Dustin (the owner) and Marcus (sales) have been involved in every step of the process with us. Marcus was extremely patient with us having some difficulties with our insurance company. They completed the work fast and thoroughly. We will continue using them in the future, when the need arises. I trust this company completely.

name: C
text: From the initial request for estimate to the final inspection, everyone I dealt with at Thompson Roofing was professional, respectful, great quality work and clean up, and every single person did what they said they would do, with no prompting or begging from me.  This was a great experience for me!  I would most definitely use Thompson Roofing again and recommend them with out hesitation.

name: Andrea Simpson
text: After months of trying to get help with my roof leak from various roofing contractors I was finally referred to Thompson Roofing. Several of these previous contractors would either, 1. never call back or failed to show up or 2. when they would come out I was being told over and over I needed a new roof. Thompson Roofing came when they said they would and fixed my leak in the concentrated area ONLY! I didn't need a whole new roof AND they were able to fix it in between all the rain.  They are truly a stand up company!

name: Pat Gatlin
text: Adam Lee was great to deal with. Easily explained work that was needed. The repairman was prompt and very polite. Work was completed in a timely manner and all trash was cleaned up afterward. I would definitely recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: DONALD KEY
text: I have been well pleased with the service of Thompson Roofing and Construction.  The sales representative Marcus Sanders was great to work with and the service was completed on time as scheduled.  The roofing materials were delivered as stated.  The roofing crew arrived at the time he said they would arrive.  I would highly recommend to anyone that need roofing service to contact Thompson Roofing and Construction.  You will be well pleases

name: L A
text: From start to finish it has been a displeasure working with the company. Scott and Jeremy were professional but the workmanship from this company wasn’t. I contacted them to repair vinyl and fascia as well in relation to the issues encountered from a previous company. They told me they didn’t need to remove he fascia because it was fine well a few months after the repairs the fascia now has problems after their repair was completed which appears to me that he repair needed was caused by their repair they made being cut too short. I had problems getting them to start due to internal issues that they were having with man power. After they finally came out they had to return more than once to fix what they were hired to do. I do not recommend this company at all and I do not recommend anyone use them. Their are better companies out there that will follow through and do what they say in a timely fashion and own up to any issues derived from a poor repair. Any previous decent reviews made should be disregarded. $3,924 for faulty repair. Save yourself the trouble.

name: Andrew Langefeld
text:
Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing my roof, and everyone was a pleasure to work with through the whole process. Scott Shaw explained the material and construction options available and answered all of my questions. A construction date was available shortly thereafter, less than three weeks later.

On the date of construction, the crew arrived and quickly had the roof stripped. They completed the new roof the same day with plenty of daylight to spare. They protected my yard and landscape and cleaned up everything. Scott did a follow-up inspection afterwards. The new roof looks great!

name: James Herring
text: I had roof leaks crop up on an 11 year old roof and had Thompson Roofing come out for an estimate.  The estimator checked in the attic as well as on the second story roof.  He provided pictures of damaged/suspect areas and described the proposed repairs.  I was impressed by his friendliness, knowledge, and overall approach.  The price was higher than a competitor (actually the original roof installer) but, based on a the info provided and contrasted with the plan of work proposed by the competitor, I was willing to pay the difference for peace of mind.   The one year warranty on workmanship also helped.  Unfortunately I wasn't available when the work was done, buy my wife said the repair tech set about his business and had it done in no time.  The original estimator visited after the work was finished (and after a good rain) to check for issues and quality of the job performed.  From initial proposal to final follow-up  I'd say we're quite satisfied with the work done by all.  I'd recommend Thompson for repairs or complete roof replacement.

name: Hillary Lenoir
text: Adam Lee, with Thompson Roofing, was very professional. He cake to our house and answered all of our questions and worked with us on our options to get just the perfect roof. The roofing crew delivered all materials before they started their work and when they came to work they worked until dark each night and cleaned up everything nicely after the job was completed! Adam came back after our roof was installed to make sure everything was installed properly and to make sure we were satisfied. Great company to work with for a new roof, friendly staff, and hard working roofers! They go the extra mile to make sure their customers are satisfied!

name: Kurt Knapp
text: Excellent and very professional service from estimate, determining options, upgrades, through installation and final inspection.  2 days to do 70 squares of roofing (tear off and replace).  Even corrected vent issues created by builder.  Crew was very professional and respectful of property.   They kept the area neat and did a complete cleanup before leaving.    This was my best experience with a contractor to date.  Flawless, painless, and excellent results.   The roof has never looked better.   Highly recommend.  Kyle from Thompson's Roofing is the professional to talk to if you need a new roof.

name: Kim Stiles
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did a great job on my roof.  They answered my call within hours and was out to my house within a day.  As it is the rainy season it took several visits for them to estimate and repair the roof.  The young gentlemen came early in the morning and we visited for a few minutes to my questions, they went straight to work and were gone within a few hours.  The "Boss Man" called me the next day to make sure everything was OK and said they had found other repairs that needed taken care of which they did so everything was taken care of as we were having so much rain.  I can really recommend this company 100%  When it comes time in the future to replace my roof, this will be the company I call.  Or any repairs!!

name: Barry Britnell
text: Fantastic job by everyone on the crew. They were in constant contact with me and the job was finished quickly and professionally. I would easily want to work with them again. Give them a call!

name: Emily W. Plumlee
text: Thompson did a great job repairing our chimney. They even came back afterwards to check and verify it was water tight before a rainstorm. Always quick to respond when I reached out with a question.

name: Colin Pollard
text: I had a great experience with Thompson: they were timely, courteous, efficient, and clean.  The crew led by Pedro that put the roof on took one day to strip the old and put on the new; really fast team!  they cleaned up afterwards, too, which was excellent.  Thompson then came out, checked the work, and fixed the gutter guards that needed minor adjustment (free of charge).  For my first experience getting a new roof, I have to say I am very happy.

name: Mike Blocker
text:
Thompson coordinated the removal of a rock chimney, the removal of old felt and roofing shingle and the replacement with new on the  house and garage, replacement of all windows with Dura Pro energy efficient windows, removal of all Masonite siding from the house and garage and replacement with vinyl siding, replacement of two house doors and one garage door, and the  installation of leafless gutters.

Four  different sub contractors were involved - chimney removers, roofers, dry wall specialists, and carpentry/siding experts.  With no exception, each subcontractor was staffed with very skilled people who worked hard and efficiently from the time they arrived until quitting time.

My wife and I are extremely pleased with the final product.  We think our 40 year-old house now looks as if it were just built.  The work started the day Thompson said and the job finished on time.  The site manager was very responsive to our needs and very easy to contact and talk to.

I would definitely use Thompson Roofing and Construction again.

name: Aaron Anderson
text: Great service. Had a roof replaced back in 2013-14 and also one here in 2020. From start to finish A++ service.

name: Bama Dogman
text: Outstanding job, and I was also very satisfied with the subcontractor they used for a major portion of it.  Not being in the business, I relied on their expertise to pick the right sub, and I wasn’t disappointed.  I am always concerned about Workers Comp insurance, and Thompson covered everything in writing for me.  I had some bidders who admitted they don’t carry it.  Thompson was not the lowest bid; maybe that’s part of the reason that they did such a great job.  Also, what they estimated is exactly what I paid, no extras or surprises.  Special thanks to Jeremy and Kyle for working to meet our tight schedule.

name: Adrian Gimenez
text: Very professional and courteous overall. They responded to all my calls/emails promptly and showed up to all scheduled appointments on time. Roof was replaced within two days after start and everything was cleaned up very well afterwards. Would highly recommended as a contractor !

name: Jeff Archer
text: We had a great experience with Thompson Roofing. Adam Lee did a great job explaining our options after hail damage. Keith got right on the scheduling. Jeremy Burns was on top of the instillation process. Angel lead the team of installers. The work was professional, the clean up was thorough and the followup was courteous. We really appreciated Jeremy and Adam doing a followup inspection before we cut them a check. It's good to work with a company you can trust.

name: Therise Benford
text: I had a leak in my garage caused from the roof. Called several roofing companies, Thompson was the only place that agreed to come out that day and at least put a temporary fix because it was due to rain that night. They came back in reasonable time and permanently corrected the issue at a reasonable cost. Will definitely use their services again.

name: Michael St.Peter
text: Great experience all around. Quality work, and the customer service was outstanding.  Will use them again for any roofing needs I have.

name: Margie at the Beach
text: Beautiful roof! I interviewed five local roofing companies and Thompson was our final choice. They impressed me right from the start when the sales person came to the interview with his GoPro video of the top of my roof, zooming in on all the trouble spots their bid would cover the repair of. He did the same when the new roof was completed. Very professional. And, the actual roofers were tidy and very friendly.

name: A Todd Baker
text: Thompson Roofing and Construction was absolutely professional. We appreciate the GoPro video Kyle made while inspecting my roof to show us exactly what was wrong and the work that needed to be done. Everything was straight forward easy to understand, organized and put on paper. Communication was excellent. We highly recommend this company! This was not our first or second roofing experience but by far the very very best! OUTSTANDING WORK!!!

name: Latoya Adams
text: The employees at the company were very professional and kind.  They took the time to ensure that any concerns that I had were addressed and explained any delays in scheduling.  The only reason they've received a 4 instead of a 5 was due to some unfortunate issues with scheduling but otherwise they were a pleasure to work with.  Quality of the work performed were their main concern which I genuinely appreciated.  Great team!!

name: Mark Rocks
text: Adam Lee did a fantastic job giving me many different options along with education on the different options to choose from and I never felt pressured at all. He and the Program Manager Keith kept me informed at all times. The roofing crew did an amazing job and cleaned up after themselves. Great experience all around! Definitely have recommended Thompson to others

name: Michael Clayton
text: Workers were easy toward with.  They were professional and efficient and friendly. In the past we have never had any complaints with work done.  Very impressed with all the work done by Thompson Roofing and Construction.  Would recommend them to anyone without reservations of any kind.

name: Nancy Picogna
text: From Kyle first coming out to all the people who worked on our enormous project to Kyle coming back to wind things up, this was a top-notch experience. Their work ethic is THE BEST (hard to find these days!) and Keith was great about always staying in touch about what was happening, when they were going to be arriving to work, etc. Could not have asked for a better experience. Thanks, Thompson Roofing!

name: Dave Hargrave
text: Installers did a great job and were pleasant when I wanted to switch up the ends of the gutters.  Work was done well and looks great!

name: James Sewald
text: They gave me  a bid on a roof and gutters. They were very good, on time and did a very nice job. Would use again.

name: David Dunaway
text: They showed up exactly when they said they would and got finished when they said they would. Even did a great job of cleaning up. Very professional. Will always highly recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: D S
text: Excellent service from the time they provided the estimate to well after the re-roof. The service after installation was equally as impressive. We received  a follow up call to check on our satisfaction and inform us that the warranty paperwork had been completed with the manufacturer. All around very professional operation and a great experience!

name: Pat Kelly
text: We are very happy with the roofing work. The employees covered every possible problem on the roof.  The job was very clean. Confidence came with the  first contact where we asked for an estimate and continued to the end. Scott answered every question and kept us updated on each step in the process.

name: Melanie Winland
text: I wish there was a no star option. 2 months of trying to get my roof repaired, after multiple revisits and the leak hasn't even slowed down! Now I'm having a different company come out to do the work that should have been done in the first place. I wouldn't recommend this company to anyone.

name: Wesley Viall
text: Great company to work with. Ask for Marcus Sanders and he will not steer you wrong. Thompson roofing has been great to work with and they replaced my roof in one day.

name: Wade Pettus
text: From start to finish, my experience with Thompson Roofing & Construction was outstanding. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent and the workmanship is top notch. I've already recommended this company to several folks and if I ever have any roofing needs in the future these guys will definitely be the first ones I call.

name: Carmen Williamson
text: the gentleman Caleab that came out to check my roof was very nice and polite. He was very informational on the process of what needs to be done with my roof. I rated this review at 4 because the young man was suppose to contact me with an estimate of my roof with 24-48 hours and its been a week now and no contact.

name: Mike Alexander
text: I contacted Thompson Roofing after noticing a leak in my roof that was starting to damage the sheetrock ceiling of an upstairs bedroom.  I went outside and saw what appeared to be a couple shingles missing.  I searched for contractors and was impressed by the reviews Thompson Roofing had received.  I put in a request for contact.  Thompson Roofing was professional from start to finish!  Scott came out to inspect the area and provide the estimate.  He did a thorough inspection including providing pictures and video so I could see the issue 1st hand.  It was quite a bit more serious than a couple shingles missing.  He also patched the roof so it would not leak anymore!  He followed up with a detailed estimate spelling out exactly what they would be doing!  I accepted the estimate and a few days later two great young men - Sammy and Jamie - came out and took care of the job!  From what I could see they did an excellent job  I figured I would receive the bill and pay, and I would be happy with that.  It was much better than that.  I received a follow-up call to see if I was satisfied.  On top of that Scott called and scheduled a walkthrough.  He came out, climbed back up on the roof and took pictures of the final job and provided them to me so I could inspect the job.  Working with Thompson roofing was a great experience!

name: Amir
text: These guys are the upmost professionals!  Outstanding attitude and second to none crew... Your hard earned money will be well spent with these guys. Thank you for taking such good care of our home 🙏🏽

name: Mary Fuller
text: The staff was prompt and. professional. The job was completed  ahead of time and Adam Lee was great at explaining the process of repairing the damage and the financial side as well. I am completely satisfied with my repairs to my roof and garage.

name: Donna Russell
text: Removed  fireplace  chimney ,  repaired  the roof  to stop leaks .

resp.text: Got a great review on that work, sending a thank you back. Hoping that you are happy dry and enjoy that leak free fix for many years to come.

name: Rick Hays
text: I am very happy with the whole experience with Thompson Roofing. They were on time with all appointments and did an extremely good job with the reroof. I highly recommend them.

name: Daniel Walter
text: The best roofer in north al

resp.text: As a family-owned local business, we sure do appreciate that review more than you know. It's customers like you that help keep us driven. God Bless

name: Warren Schoenknecht
text:
Scott was very professional and friendly, he did a complete investigation of my roof problems. he explained what the problems were and what had to be done to correct them. He provided me with a complete estimate to perform the repairs. I agreed with the estimate and we scheduled a day to perform them.  The repair crew did a very neat professional repair on my roof, we have had two heavy rains since the repairs were completed and there were no leaks
GREAT JOB!

name: Denice Kirby
text: Thompson Roofing repaired our roof just in time before all the rain came.  We love working with Thompson Roofing because they show up on the job and do quality work.  Thank you Thompson Roofing!

name: Kevin Redmond
text: Despite some delays in our small project due to some understandable personal issues, the team at Thompson was very professional and communicative.  They were easy to get in touch with, always called back when they said they would, and they did a great job with our repairs.  Will definitely use them again in the future for pretty much any construction project they can help with.  They'll be our first stop!

name: Kaz Watanabe
text: Great customer service.  Very attentive and on top of things.  Highly recommend.

name: Brian
text: Finally finding a great roofing company after dealing with a bunch of duds over the past couple years can really do a lot for your stress level, wish I would have gone with them for my workshop.  This experience started with Kyle coming by and going over all the options, the measurements and pre-inspection (satellite and drone based respectively, cool stuff).  We settled on what we wanted and got on the schedule.  The materials were delivered a day before and I noticed that the supply company sent the wrong decking (I asked to special order a specific type), Kyle and the job foreman, Keith, came out first thing the next morning and swapped out the decking in their own trucks before the roofers even needed to start using it.  Finally, after it was all done Kyle came back for a post inspection. He found some corners in these uncommonly-designed window wells I have that needed a bit more flashing to make sure water would never get in there again.  He sent out his repair guy Jamie, who knocked 5 windows out in 2 hours.  I am so happy with my roof.

name: James Gates
text: I needed a new roof on a shared-townhome in Madison, AL. Thompson Roofing and Construction were professionals, honest, reliable, and affordable. They were able to do the project on my timeline, and the communication I received while working with them was top-notch. I will absolutely be working with them in the future, and recommend them without hesitation.

name: Clinton Herbert
text:
I am pleased with the work and professionalism I recieved from Thompson Roofing.

Unlike any other roofing business in Devatur or nearby, this company actually has a website to inform us of the work they do. That was my main reason for choosing this company for my roof leak. The process of getting an inspection to work completion was effortless. I will further do business with this company if I ever have roofing issues in the future.

name: Hoyt Jones
text: Sales Rep (Scott Shaw)went over and above to make sure my family was taken care of. Especially nice as we were a small job that many wouldn't even give us an estimate on our emergency repair. Now  we are planning on doing the entire roof and will be calling Thompson.

name: Terri Garlen
text: Excellent folks to work with. Would recommend them for any job.

name: Seyed Sadeghi
text: We have a very good experience with Thompson Roofing and Construction. They are prompt, professional, and on time. We are happy with our new roof and the quality of the work. We recommend them strongly.

name: R Henson
text: Great company to do business with.  Very honest and do what they say they will do.  Highly recommend to anyone.

name: Rick Austin
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did and excellent job of reroofing and vinyl siding our entire home, garage, and shed!  Also, they did a great job of replacing screen, hanging new shutters, and exterior painting.  It was a very pleasant experience working with Kyle, Keith, and Jeremy.  If and when I need work done in the future  I will certainly think of them first!

name: Anita Dillaha
text: This company did an excellent job on my roof.  Arrived on time and cleaned up very well.  Scott Shaw was very professional and explained everything to me.

name: Robert Scites
text: I'm well pleased with every aspect of my interaction with Thompson Roofing and Construction. Their communication was excellent, pricing fair, and my repair seems to be of good quality.

name: Gordon Wilkerson
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing our 3 leaking skylights.there was a lot of unseen damage to the roof decking that hey also took care of. I was pleased they took the extra time to repair all damage. I would recommend Thompson Roofing to anybody in need of a roofing repair.

name: Bobby Graham
text: From beginning to end our experience with these people has been superb for a business. Adam Lee has been special, and the workers were dedicated to doing good work. I doubt that you’ll find this kind of operation very much.

name: Chuck Lindstrom
text: Marcus and the staff were great to work with.  Could not even tell that they had been there when I got home from work.  Would highly recommend Thompson roofing.

name: Will Harmond
text: Thompson roofing was the obvious choice for our family. Customer service was over the top, the care and concern for our home was refreshing, and the multiple options of coverage and design made our difficult decisions much easier. We can't thank Kyle O'Toole, our customer service representative, enough for assisting us every step of the way, and making Thompson Roofing the best experience for us before, during, and after our roofing experience.

name: Sharon Tate
text:
Great Job and it looks wonderful!

Thank you!

name: Austin Graner
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job on my roof and completed the job in just over a day.

name: Travis Key
text: Thompson Roofing met my needs in roof repair. From the initial contact from Marcus Sanders, all the way to roof completion, Thompson Roofing made sure everything was done in a timely manner.

name: Lori Kamus
text: Very thorough inspection (with photos), 30 year workmanship warranty, and a great crew with supervisors providing progress updates are among the reasons I’m impressed with their quality service and superior professionalism — great products, and even better people!

name: Kenny Cagle
text: Definitely would use again, but don't think we will need to after the excellent job! Adam is the best for sure!!!

name: Jessica Weber
text: Very personable and accommodating!  We had a very frustrating leak that kept coming back and Thompson Roofing was very persistent! Leak is fixed and they replaced our attic fans! Amazing people and very reasonably priced! We are a forever customer!

name: Deborah Smith
text: The level of professionalism was excellent! Really answered all my questions and were quick to get the job done in a timely manner! Just AWESOME!

name: Sharon Williams
text: Professional, courteous, and excellent work.  Very satisfied!

name: Nicole Farmer-Landry
text: They did a fantastic job repairing our roof and dormer windows! They were also very professional, organized and communicated with us from beginning estimate to closing invoice.

name: Burley Garrison
text: was very helpful through the whole process. Did not pay anything until both Thompson rep Kyle and I both was happy with the final results. I hope to work with them again in the future.

name: Fli Mi
text:
Owner says they do business in my area....estimator comes out...calls me today stuttering for words and says project manager doesn't want to come this far. Bunch of BS! Someone doesn't know what they are doing...glad I DID NOT USE THEM since honesty is NOT there strong point!
Well to your reply..
You tell me one thing, state another, renig on the end result=TELLING ME ON THE PHONE (RECORDED)ITS TOO FAR AND THIS REPLY  TELLING ME SOMETHING ELSE! Would not recommend you to ANYONE...DONT LIKE LIES!

resp.text:
Dear Fly Y,
Our business model is to be up front with all our customers and always take the time to explain the work, our process and provide detailed estimates of scope and cost. We have great relationships with our clients, indeed much of our business comes from referrals and past customers. In your case, we did not believe we could satisfy you so we thought it best to decline the work.

name: Mark Stone
text: Replaced 20 year chimney cap and flashing and rust stained chimney siding at a fair price.   Good work,

name: Doris Boston

name: Jon Wooten

name: Karen Morris

text: I had a storm repair which damaged about 6 shingles and some siding on a chimney. They repaired the shingles and cleaned up on Easter Sunday, after missing Saturday repair because of rain.  They we're a little pricey @ 600 dollars for about an hours work.

Thompson Roofing did an excellent job replacing my roof after some spring hail damage to my roof. They did a very good cleanup job.
The workers arrived on time each dat (two days) and did not leave a mess between the two days.

name: Russell Sage
text: This was a small repair to replace some shingles that were ripped off by high winds.  The repairs were were completed promptly by skilled professionals.  I recommend Thompson roofing and construction.

name: Paula Stone

name: AmandaLee SuddithGreen
text: I used to shop at the habitat but they are Under New Management and prices have quadrupled I do not recommend they have attached to anyone anymore furthermore the staff followed me around the store while I was shopping and made me very uncomfortable

resp.text: We are a non profit organization and our mission is to help families in need. Our merchandise is priced according to other non profit organizations. We have to make money to pay our employees, and utilities, as well as raise money for the Habitat homes. I am sorry you feel this way. As far as you feeling like you were being followed, I reassure you that if an employee was following you it was not done on purpose. If you ever feel like someone is following you again please speak with Nicole. We do apologize and hope that you will give us another chance in the future. Thank you.

name: Kathleen Coats
text: They have some really great secoind hand used goods. Also a clean and organized environment with very friendly and helpful staff. Me being a book worm was well worth the visit for me. Especially added to the fact of a reasonable price. I was a very happy patron 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback!  We work hard to give our customers quality service and products!

name: Matthew Sufczinski

name: Krissi Harpel
text: All the reviews were great so I was excited to get started with this company.  Their representative came to the house and brought a contractor, I was told it would take about a week to generate an estimate of materials.  During that week I sent some colors I liked and a couple of questions and I was not getting any response from the designer .  Once the week was up I sent an email to the designer and told her I needed someone who was going to be responsive to emails .  She immediately responded saying that she could not get my cabinets to meet our timeline and I would have to find someone else ...which if she had paid attention I had asked for an estimate on painting and replacing .  I then left a message for someone from management. to call me and got no response.  Very very disappointing

resp.text: I spoke with Krissi and explained a few items to her concerning her project and attempted to assist her with her project even though Coastal is not performing the project.  Hopefully this will help.  We do not paint cabinets and recommend under normal conditions that this not be done.  Typically, a paint job will have to repeated in the near term due to underlying issues with cabinets themselves.

name: Hilton Perry
text: For many months my wife and I  have wanted to remodel our bath but finding some one that was knowledgeable and and responsive was impossible and had almost given up. A friend told us to call  Coastal Kitchen & Bath and with in just a few days we were set up to meet and go over what we wanted and measure. The next week we were picking out the flooring, cabinets and fixtures we wanted. Today we have the bath that we had visioned for moths. Very responsive and courteous.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  It can be amazing what a kitchen remodel can do for the appearance of your home and your piece of mind.

name: Chelsie Sotero
text: I have had the pleasure of working with Jill here and she is a delight! This company should be proud to have her as an employee. She is very knowledgeable, helpful and very friendly. I will tell everyone I know to make sure to stop in!!!

resp.text: you're going to love your new mud room

name: me to you
text:
The lady, Jill, was very helpful.  If you go there you have to order what you see on display.  Ordering means a 3 or 4 week delay.  They have a variety of everything related to the bathroom.  My apologies because I did not take photos.

My contractor wants it yesterday. Seems the stuff is never there fast enough for them. They want to go to Lowe's, pick it up, and install it the same day.

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity.  We do not keep cabinets in stock since there are so many options, sizes and colors.  Unfortunately, contractors can experience delays and then want everything yesterday, like you said.

name: Shawn Taylor
text: Great food

resp.text: Thanks for the great review on food...we'll take the 5 star review but don't serve food.  :)

name: Mike Tate
text: Everything turned out GREAT!  The few minor issues were promptly taken care of and the project was completed on time! Love it!

resp.text: Sometimes a kitchen remodel becomes an art and not a science but we stick with the job until you're happy.

name: Julie Bertolla
text: I had a fantastic experience with my recent remodel. Jill is very knowledgeable and went above and beyond to make sure I was happy.

resp.text: Great to hear.  I hope you enjoy your new cabinets and kitchen remodel

name: Michael Leserra
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  Hopefully we can assist with your kitchen remodeling project.

text: Awesome job on our kitchen counters! Defiantly recommend for quality work!

resp.text: you can't go wrong with granite counter tops, easy close cabinet doors and drawers and a tile back splash

name: justin hamilton
text: Top notch service and quality.  They're certified designer was a great help

resp.text: Impact windows are a great replacement to protect against storms

name: Alla Nikitina
text: Out of business

resp.text: Actually, we are not out of business.  We have a new location that we are working on opening up after the Hurricane Sally destruction to our old building but we have been working from remote locations since Sally.  Our website, Facebook page, Pinterest, Google My Business page, etc. all reflect we are open for business and have been open for business.  Our phone number is active as well so feel free to contact us if you have a project you are interested in us quoting for you.  251-943-5358.

name: ted croft
text: They dont stand behind their products! Bought a marble vanity top and they installed two sinks (undermount) and the silicone bled through to the surface of the top and stained it where the silicone was applied for the sinks. The top is ruined! After sending pics Mike told me to call the manufacturer of the silicone to get it fixed or remedied. What terrible customer service. Good thing he sold the company!

resp.text: Ted is correct, the business has been sold to the owner of Folkers Window Company.  The marble vanity top Ted purchased was a old remnant from the warehouse and was "sold as is" for a very cheap price.  Unfortunately with remnants and very low prices, these things happen.  This was communicated to the customer at the time of the sale.  The best way to avoid issues with products and expired warranties is to purchase new products instead of remnants.

name: Anisha Penton
text: Amazing company to work with! Very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful staff.

resp.text: Great choice with Silestone quartz counter tops

name: Gayle Patterson
text: Jill Kinard is very knowledgeable and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks much.  Hopefully we can assist with your remodeling project

name: Cheryl McCoy
text: Good products, pricey

resp.text: Thanks for the business and the review.  No, we are not the cheapest because as you said "good products".  We do not sell junk and we use professional installers and not sub contractors.  In addition, we use stainless steel fasteners, high grade caulks, etc. all which lead to a higher price and a higher quality installation.  Thus, we will typically not be the cheapest...but we're the best.

name: Rebecca Campbell
text: Great place. Great prices. Friendly people. Always very helpful.

name: Debbie Daniel
text: I have tried for two years to have a glass company come and look at a custom made double paned window that needed the inside glass replaced.  No luck.  Then I thought I will try one more time.  I call Huntsville Glass, Mr. James Davis came out and looked at the window, they called and gave me the estimate, and once the glass was in Mr. Davis came back and installed the glass.  He was exceptionally professional, let me know when he would be out and in no time it was done.  I really appreciate the service.  The window looks great.  I will do business only with Huntsville Glass.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Wow Debbie! We hate to hear that you ran into so much trouble before you found us. James is definitely an asset to our company as well as to our customers. Thank you!

name: Debbie Schaffer
text: We are repeat customers - this is our second glass shower door installed by Huntsville Glass, and we are extremely pleased. From our first phone conversation, the installer coming to the house to measure, and the actual installation, Huntsville Glass was professional, courteous, careful, and did excellent work.The first door was installed over 4 years ago and still looks beautiful and works like new today. The second door - a slider door, is only a week old, but we are loving it. If we needed a third shower door, I would call Huntsville Glass! Over the years, I've also had various pieces of picture frame glass and mirror glass cut to size and had excellent service too. Thanks to installers John and Curtis!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know you have had a great overall experience with us over the years Debbie. We are always glad to hear our technicians and staff are taking great care of our customers. We look forward to continuing to help you with your glass and mirror needs!

name: cathy veque
text: We have had Huntsville Glass replace the double pane glass in several of the windows at our home.  They are very good to work with from the office to the technicians.  They arrived on time and went right to work.  They did the reinstall  in a short time frame and were very professional and courteous.  Today was our 2nd time to use them for this service and they were once again a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Always a pleasure to hear from repeat customers. We hope to always be your "go to" for any and all of your glass needs.

name: Ryan Green
text: Punctual, quick, and affordable. Responded to my broken window situation in very little time. Pleased with my experience would use HGC again for my glass needs. James JR did a great job and was very communicative during the entire process. Thank you!

resp.text: Ryan, we are so glad to hear about your pleasurable experience. It's always great to hear when our employees put extra effort into customer service and communication. We look forward to serving you again!

name: Sheryl Payne
text: Recently a rock got flung toward my storm door while the front yard was being mowed.  I had one of those decorative films on the window pane that actually kept the glass from shattering everywhere. I called HSV Glass and working with the support team was very easy. I accepted the estimate and 3 weeks later my new window pane is installed. Mr. John May and Mr. James Davis, Sr. came out this morning and did a great job of removing the old shattered pane and installing the new one.  I was told to let the window 'set' for about 24 hours to really let the seal do it's job and after that I can put a new film on if I wanted.  I really appreciate the work the guys did and of the great customer support /service from Ms. Sherri.

resp.text: Sheryl, we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We understand that dealing with the unexpected can be difficult. So glad to hear that we provided such service.

name: Jon Hutchinson
text: Very pleased with Huntsville Glass. Very friendly, courteous and professional staff. James and James Jr. did a fantastic install of a new pane to replace one that was broken by a flying rock.

resp.text: Thank you Jon!!

name: Derrick Graham
text:
I wanted to share my testimony. It’s long but it just shows how much this company cares.

I took my broken window glass to Huntsville Glass for repair. They gave me a temporary one because it would take around five weeks for permanent fixture to  return for pickup.  During this time, I took my bent screen frame to them, or so I thought.  I was told they were unable to do the work and referred me to another company in Huntsville.  Due to my poor memory, I forgot about the conversation. I called to inquiry when would the work be completed. They searched and searched around their facility and couldn’t find it.  To make a long story short, they went the extra mile and called other glass and screen repair companies. They found my screen, through their tireless efforts, they coordinated with those companies to get it repaired. Then, they called me and told me where it was and gave me the number. I was so impressed and I felt bad because I thought they had it.  I apologized and to my surprise, they were very kind and patient with me.

I said all of that to say this!!!!! THIS COMPANY CARES ABOUT YOU AND YOUR BUSINESS!!!!!’ Thank you all for being so professional and patient with me.

resp.text: Its great to know that some businesses still care about their customers. It is an honor to be included in that prestigious group.

name: Camaria Caudle
text: Huntsville Glass has worked with us for years! James Davis, Jr. Is amazing! Our residents always have nothing but nice things to say when he come to the property. Service is always professional, and timely.

resp.text: Camaria, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how pleased you are. We especially appreciate you telling us that the customer service you receive is consistently excellent!

name: A.J. Battle
text: Team worked quickly, and efficiently. Davis Sr, and Davis Jr. Very prompt, and professional

resp.text: Fantastic!! Glad to hear!

name: Phillip Tucker
text: Excellent service provided by Huntsville Glass. Our repair was relatively simple, but technicians John May and James Davis, Sr. were courteous, professional, and quick. The replacement of our broken window glass was done as scheduled and to our satisfaction. I would definitely recommend Huntsville Glass for home or business glass repair/replace work!

resp.text: We appreciate your recommendation. It was pleasure serving you. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Nick Coleman
text: These guys were great! Excellent service and great install by John May and James Davis Sr. My son broke our window over Thanksgiving and they came out quoted, ordered and installed soon as possible. Highly recommend!  Thank you

resp.text: You're Welcome! It's never fun dealing with broken windows during the holidays. I am so glad we were able to be there for you!

name: Robert Wolff
text: From start to finish it was a  great experience.  First I got a quote on the phone.  Then I placed the order.  Within a couple of days of placing the order, my glass was manufactured and John called to schedule the delivery.  John and James were courteous, considerate, and friendly.  My glass top for my desk is fantastic.  Highly recommend the Huntsville Glass Company Team!  Thank you John and James.

resp.text: We, too, had a great experience Robert. We are very glad we were able to provide you with your desk top glass in a timely manner. Don't hesitate to give us call next time you find yourself needing glass.

name: Will Johnson
text: James and John really did an outstanding job in replacing my windows.  Due to warranty issues,  I had three windows that needed replacement, They were very efficient in their work and cleanup.   I would certainly call on Huntsville Glass to do my next job.

resp.text: We appreciate your business and we thank you for your recommendation!

name: mike fischer
text:
Huntsville Glass Company of Huntsville, Al  staff were phenomenal, all the way from the initial call, to the technicians contacting me to arrange a the initial service call to measure the window to be replaced, and subsequently arriving. The staff was professional and courteous. The Staff contacted me with a price quote, which was extremely reasonable, and a best estimate with when the replacement glass should arrive.
The technicians contacted me the day prior to arrange a convenient time to replace the damaged glass, in turn showed up promptly at the scheduled time. Both technicians, # 80 and #95 were the utmost courteous and professional, went right to work, answered all the questions very honestly and forthright.  They completed the task and the workmanship was stellar from start to finish.
I would highly recommend Huntsville Glass to anyone now and in the future.

resp.text: OUTSTANDING!! We are very proud of all our employees, from the office staff to the installers. Thank you so much for taking the time to express all your kind words. We are so very pleased to hear of your positive experience and we look forward to serving you again!

name: Nathaniel Zickefoose
text: I had an attic window replaced at an affordable rate. John May and James Davis, Jr were professional and did a great job. I will definitely be using Huntsville Glass again when needed!

resp.text: It was pleasure doing business with you and we look forward to future endeavors.

text: As a custom cabinet company, we rely heavily on skilled glass professionals to provide high quality glass and mirror products. resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and for letting us know that our team has taken great care of you. We really appreciate your business and look forward to our continued partnership. We also love the pictures you shared. Beautiful work! Our glass and mirror definitely accents your magnificent cabinets!

name: Bette Goodman
text: This is the second time Huntsville Glass has installed shower doors at our house. We highly recommend them for the quality of the doors and excellent professional installation!  Thank you to our technicians John Saeger and Curtis Campbell 😊

resp.text: We value our repeat customers and we welcome the recommendation. Thank you for your business!

name: Steven Werdehoff
text: John Seeger, Curtis Campbell and the team at Huntsville Glass are amazing. Took a tricky job no one else would touch, made it look easy and at affordable prices! Will always be my go to shop for any glass needs.

name: Brian Mayfield
text: John May and James Davis, Sr. performed a window repair/replacement in our home.  They not only saved us considerable $$ over our initial expectation, but they also made a great impression about the professional culture of this company.  They showed up to both appointments on time, were very professional, and did a great job with the repair.  They were even kind to our dog.  We will use this company again.

resp.text: FANTASTIC!! We appreciate all your kind words as well as the reminder that we have some great folks working for us!

name: Richard Hull
text: We are very pleased with the installation of mirrors done by John and his assistant.  On time, pleasant and efficient.

I really wanted the grille color to match the neighboring windows. John had a fan deck of colors with him and James was awesome  when I stopped in the store to place my order, helping to assure me the right color was ordered.  Once the windows arrived they were able to come out the next day and I was so happy the install crew was going to be John and James again.  They were quick, efficient and wonderful to work with.  Will definitely hire them again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thorough review Kim. We do have some pretty amazing technicians and we are so glad to hear you had a great experience. We look forward to helping you again in the future!

name: Harold Robinson
text: John and James did a very good job replacing glass panels in a 40 year old door. They were early for their appointment to boot. Very happy.

resp.text: Harold, Thank You for letting us know you were pleased! We like it when our installers exceed expectations!

name: Al Moore
text: Replaced a large fixed pane in the peak of a gable. They were right on schedule and I was very pleased with the work. They took extra care cleaning up after the job. I will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! We look forward to working with you again.

name: TA CHUNG WANG
text: They showed up on time and were very professional. The two gentlemen, John and James, demonstrated excellent workmanship. They replaced glass of my 78” arch window and you can’t tell the frame was worked on. It was a very pleasant encounter.  It is a five star coming from me.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing about your recent experience. We are so glad to hear our technicians took great care of you and your home. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

text: Huntsville Glass showed up to estimate and installation appointments on time and swiftly made the repair.  Their price was extremely fair and competitive.  Their installers explained the job to us in detail, making us feel very comfortable with the quality and timeliness of the work being performed.  We'd give them a 15/10 if we could!

resp.text: Meghan, we really appreciate you letting us know that you had a great overall experience. We are glad to have been able to help and would be happy to help with any future glass needs!
